chart_description: The I/O some pressure chart measures the percentage of time that the system's disk I/O subsystem is experiencing some pressure. This pressure can be caused by multiple factors such as paging, swapping, or high disk I/O traffic.

dimension_descriptions.some_10: The percentage of time the disk I/O subsystem was experiencing some pressure over the last 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.some_300: The percentage of time the disk I/O subsystem was experiencing some pressure over the last 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.some_60: The percentage of time the disk I/O subsystem was experiencing some pressure over the last minute.
